snippet.title: Serious Sam XBox Intro
snippet.description: This is the intro that plays after selecting the difficulty setting in the XBox version of Serious Sam.  I did not include the Episode 1 intro because it's mostly the same from the PC First Encounter, save for the new Serious Sam model.
